level.heading: Payable through or payable at bank; collecting bank.

level.text: If an item states that it is "payable through" a bank identified in the item, (i) the item designates the bank as a collecting bank and does not by itself authorize the bank to pay the item, and (ii) the item may be presented for payment only by or through the bank.
If an item states that it is "payable at" a bank identified in the item, the item is equivalent to a draft drawn on the bank.
If a draft names a nonbank drawee and it is unclear whether a bank named in the draft is a co-drawee or a collecting bank, the bank is a collecting bank.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-249
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-249, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28:4-101.
